The claim was made by Arsalan Iftikhar: a Muslim author, attorney, and commentator, during a roundtable discussion on "Meet the Press" on November 22, 2015.
The claim was fact: checked by the expert at the request of a reader who wanted to verify its authenticity.
The expert found that the claim was not: including information about Barack Obama's religious affiliation as a Christian and his attendance at various churches.
